item.title: Mode Configuration
Data Source
item.description: Any data source configured as spring bean can be cooperated with spring namespace. Example In this example, the database driver is MySQL, and connection pool is HikariCP, which can be replaced with other database drivers and connection pools. When using ShardingSphere JDBC, the property name of the JDBC pool depends on the definition of the respective JDBC pool, and is not defined by ShardingSphere. For related processing, please refer to the class org.
